name: Misty Forest Path
description: A hauntingly beautiful scene of a narrow hiking trail winding through a dense coniferous forest shrouded in thick fog. Tall, slender evergreen trees create a mysterious atmosphere as the path disappears into the mist.
alternativeText: A foggy forest scene with tall evergreen trees lining a narrow dirt path that curves through the misty woodland.

name: Lavender Horizon Bridge
description: A breathtaking panoramic view of a suspension bridge stretching across calm waters, bathed in mesmerizing lavender and purple hues. The bridge's silhouette creates an elegant architectural line across the horizon, with the water below mirroring the dreamy sky.
alternativeText: A suspension bridge spanning across calm waters under a purple-tinted sky, creating a serene and ethereal landscape.

name: Minimalist Workspace
description: An elegantly organized dual workspace featuring contrasting aesthetics - one with a dark keyboard and one with a white keyboard. A wooden shelf with decorative items separates the two areas, while coffee cups add a touch of warmth to this clean, productive environment.
alternativeText: A minimalist workspace with two computer setups, featuring both dark and white keyboards, decorative items on a wooden shelf, and coffee cups.

name: Grizzly Bear Family
description: A powerful wildlife scene capturing a mother grizzly bear leading her cubs across a rocky ridge. Set against a backdrop of misty forest and patches of snow, this image showcases the raw beauty of wilderness and the tender bond between a mother and her young.
alternativeText: A mother grizzly bear with her cubs walking along a rocky ridge with a forest and snowy landscape in the background.

name: Golden Hour Silhouette
description: A dreamlike silhouette of a person with flowing hair standing in a sunlit meadow during golden hour. The sun creates a dramatic backlight effect, illuminating the edges of the figure and the surrounding tall grass with warm, golden tones.
alternativeText: Silhouette of a person with flowing hair in a meadow at sunset, with golden sunlight creating a dramatic backlight effect.

name: Highland Cow Landscape
description: A majestic Highland cow with its distinctive long, reddish-brown fur stands on a rugged coastal landscape. The vintage-toned image captures the animal's unique character against a backdrop of sandy terrain and distant cliffs, evoking the wild beauty of rural Scotland.
alternativeText: A Highland cow with long reddish-brown fur standing on rocky coastal terrain with cliffs in the background.
